seek out, [Refs 1st c.BC+]; περίτινος [NT]

vocabInfos.shortDef: to seek out, seek earnestly; (passive) to be held responsible
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to seek out, seek earnestly; (passive) to be held responsible
to seek out, investigate diligently, scrutinize, 1Pet. 1:10; to ask for, beseech earnestly, Heb. 12:17; to seek diligently or earnestly after, Acts 15:17; Rom. 3:11; Heb. 10:6; from the Hebrew, to require, exact, demand, Lk. 11:50, 51; Heb. 12:07*
